MISSION.title: MISSION
MISSION.description:
At Wagner&Partners¬Æ, we are committed to achieving extraordinary success through unwavering honesty, relentless innovation, and a steadfast dedication to sustainability.
We prioritize fostering a balanced work/life environment that empowers our employees to thrive both professionally and personally.
Our passion for excellence drives us to deliver superior products and services while upholding justice, respecting local laws, and adhering to ethical business practices endorsed by the International Chamber of Commerce.
We reject favoritism, value our employees as integral members of our corporate family, and support their career development with clear opportunities for growth and participation in our success.
As responsible corporate citizens, we actively support social causes, alleviate poverty, and protect the environment by avoiding harmful practices and preserving our planet‚Äôs ecosystem for future generations.

partners.name: Gisbert Heinz Wagner
partners.title: Managing Director
partners.bio:
• Internationally recognized economist with over 50 years of experience in global trade, finance, and project management.
  • Principal at Arthur Young (now Ernst & Young), leading logistics and operations for clients worldwide.
  • Advised on major trade agreements, including NAFTA and CETA, shaping North American and EU economic policies.
  • Co-founded Paragon Estates GmbH in The Bahamas, managing post-hurricane rebuilding and tourism projects.
  • Facilitated high-value international financial transactions, including currency and precious metals trading.
  • Taught at universities like USC and Seneca College, developing materials on international finance and project management.
  • Trusted advisor to corporate leaders, governments, and institutions, ensuring value-driven, confidential outcomes.
  • Maintains a global network with footholds in North America, Western Europe, Asia, and the Caribbean.

partners.name: Hao Li
partners.title: Managing Director
partners.bio:
• Expert in international business relations, driving strategic partnerships across Europe and Asia.
  • Partner Manager at Wagner & Partners, advising on global business setups, risk management, and key account development.
  • Led operations and digital communication projects for a Canadian NGO, enhancing global outreach.
  • Former Managing Director at WINGMAN International and United Unique Expo, overseeing 200+ trade shows annually.
  • Developed key accounts with top brands like Huawei, VW, and Porsche, strengthening China-Europe business ties.
  • Built and managed local and global competency partnerships for trade fairs and events in Germany and Asia.
  • Spearheaded business development in China for Holtmann Messe + Event, establishing branch offices.
  • Experienced designer, creating corporate branding and 3D designs for clients like Siemens and Messe N√ºrnberg.
  • Multilingual professional fluent in Chinese and German

STRUCTURE.title: STRUCTURE
STRUCTURE.description: Our global structure and network, with strong footholds in North America, the Caribbean, Western Europe, and Asia, ensure efficient, sustainable operations and seamless support for clients worldwide.

International Business Resources.title: International Business Resources
International Business Resources.description:
Do you have a high-quality product but struggle to access international or country-specific markets?
Are you seeking reliable, high-quality international suppliers for bulk purchases?
Do you need support to implement your international business plan by finding the right resources in your target country?
Are you looking to maximize returns on your assets through secure international markets?
We provide tailored solutions to help you achieve your global business objectives efficiently and sustainably.

Cross-Border Financial Solutions and Ser.title: Cross-Border Financial Solutions and Services
Cross-Border Financial Solutions and Ser.description:
Through our global financial network, we offer customized financial solutions that enable maximum financial flexibility, asset growth, and risk mitigation while strictly adhering to legal regulations.
Our services are designed to support your financial goals across multiple countries, ensuring both legal and economic security.

Technology.title: Technology
Technology.description:
We facilitate the transfer of cutting-edge technologies and patents to investors, fostering sustainable innovation and global commercialization through our extensive network.
The following R&D results and patented technologies are seeking potential investors or buyers:
  • THERMAL PLASMA SPUTTERING OF GRAPHENE - FOR AN ADVANCED METHOD OF APPLYING GRAPHENE TO LARGE SURFACES THROUGH
  • H2O BASED FUEL
  • H2 FOR THERAPEUTIC USE
  • HYPOCHLOROUS ACID BASED BUSINESS
  • LIPOSOMAL VITAMIN C BASED LOTIONS (SALVES OR BALMS)
  • SHAKE BASED ON LIPOSOMAL VC
  • LIPOSOMAL VC COMPOSED OF ALTERNATIVE INGREDIENTS
  • SPARK PLUG

China Affairs Expert.title: China Affairs Expert
China Affairs Expert.description:
Do you want to connect with the world‚Äôs second-largest economy and its highest growth rate?
Are you aiming to establish your products and business in a market of 1.4 billion people?
Do you need assistance navigating political or regulatory challenges in China?
With our unique relationships and specialized channels, we provide tailored solutions to maximize your interests and successfully address both routine and complex challenges.

Food & Agriculture.title: Food & Agriculture
Food & Agriculture.description: Through our extensive global network, we support sustainable farming initiatives that enhance food security and drive economic prosperity. Our projects connect local producers with international buyers, ensuring fair trade practices and environmentally friendly methods. We collaborate with stakeholders to implement innovative solutions that reduce environmental impact while fostering long-term growth. This commitment to sustainability strengthens communities and promotes a healthier planet.

Technology & Patents.title: Technology & Patents
Technology & Patents.description:
Our global network empowers innovators by facilitating the transfer of cutting-edge technologies and patents to investors worldwide. We provide comprehensive support, from intellectual property protection to market entry strategies, ensuring sustainable commercialization. Our expertise helps bridge the gap between innovation and impact, creating value for businesses and communities. This approach drives technological advancement while prioritizing environmental responsibility.
The following R&D results and patented technologies are seeking potential investors or buyers:
  • THERMAL PLASMA SPUTTERING OF GRAPHENE - FOR AN ADVANCED METHOD OF APPLYING GRAPHENE TO LARGE SURFACES THROUGH
  • H2O BASED FUEL
  • H2 FOR THERAPEUTIC USE
  • HYPOCHLOROUS ACID BASED BUSINESS
  • LIPOSOMAL VITAMIN C BASED LOTIONS (SALVES OR BALMS)
  • SHAKE BASED ON LIPOSOMAL VC
  • LIPOSOMAL VC COMPOSED OF ALTERNATIVE INGREDIENTS
  • SPARK PLUG

Investment & Foundation.title: Investment & Foundation
Investment & Foundation.description: Leveraging our global network, we offer secure investment opportunities that balance profitability with sustainability. Our foundations support initiatives that drive economic growth and social good, from education to poverty alleviation. We partner with clients to create lasting impact, ensuring investments align with environmental and ethical standards. This holistic approach fosters prosperity and strengthens communities worldwide.
